import React,{useEffect, useRef,useState}from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Col,Row,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import {BASE_URL} from '../utils/config' import useFetch from '../hooks/useFetch' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const reviewMsgRef =useRef('') const [tourRating,setTourRating]=useState(null) ///1)this is a static data later we will call our API and load our data from database // const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) //fetch data from database au lieu de 1 const {data:tour,loading,error}=useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}`) /// destructure properties from tour object const {photo,title,desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating,avgRating}= calculateAvgRating(reviews) ///format date const options ={month:'long',day:'numeric',year:'numeric'}; ////submit request to the server const submitHandler = e =>{ e.preventDefault() const reviewText =reviewMsgRef.current.value //later will call api // alert(`${reviewText}, ${tourRating}`) } useEffect(()=>{ window.scrollTo(0,0) },[]) return ( <>
{ loading &&

{title}

{avgRating===0 ? null :avgRating} {totalRating ===0 ? 'Not rated': ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {distance}K/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* -------- tour reviews section -------- */}

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(review =>(
muhib

{new Date('01-18-2023').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
{/*-------- tour reviews section -------- */}
{/* stop:42:30 */} }
) } export default TourDetails
